info.name: Chaos H.P. for PS3HAX
info.description:
This is a tumultuous hackjob that I've been personally using for a while.

The purpose is to clean up superfluous elements, purdyfy things a bit, and maximize screen space.
info.additionalInfo: ◦ Uses cleaner, smoother, sexier Aileron font ◦ Uses Hack font for monospaced text ◦ Stretches content to fill browser width ◦ Shrinks Forum Header to save space ◦ Removes sidebar from homepage & forum ◦ Removes ad-boxes to maximize space ◦ Fixes minor bugs with the default ps3hax theme ◦ Draws Article Post/Content boxes with Pure CSS instead of default raster images    (makes things look smoother and it's the easiest way to properly stretch-fill the blogpages) ◦ Tweaks the appearance of Quoteboxes and Quoteboxes nested in Quoteboxes ◦ Tweaks the appearance of Horizontal Line Separators ◦ Tweaks the appearance of Codeboxes    (custom scrollbars seen in the preview require a webkit browser) ◦ Fixes/Restores missing Post-Images ◦ Replaces old Emoticons/Smileys with smoother and more uniform Koloboks    (Individual emoticons may be changed in future updates without notice at my discretion) ◦ Fixes Quoteboxes in comments on frontpage articles (*New*)
